rules_text: All creatures gain decayed. [i](They can't block. When a creature with decayed attacks, its controller sacrifices it at end of combat.)[/i] [i](It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“Within twenty-four hours, we'd consumed the entire planet. That was all it took to end an entire world.”
—Reed Richards[/i]
